allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Australian Islamic Centre website - initial release

Features:
- Homepage with hero, prayer times, programs, services sections
- About page with timeline and team info
- Programs, Services, Events, Media pages
- Contact page with form \(mailto integration\)
- Donate page with Stripe integration \(currently disabled for review\)
- Visit page with directions and facilities
- Architecture page showcasing the building
- Resources page for worshippers
- Responsive design with animations
- Prayer times display

Technical:
- Next.js 16 with App Router
- Tailwind CSS 4 for styling
- Framer Motion for animations
- Stripe integration \(disabled pending configuration\)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Fix Stripe webhook build error - use lazy initialization

Prevents build-time error when STRIPE_SECRET_KEY is not set

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Wire up all pages to fetch content from Sanity CMS

- Add draft mode preview with /api/draft and /api/disable-draft endpoints
- Add on-demand revalidation via /api/revalidate webhook
- Create event detail pages with dynamic routing
- Add preview button configuration to Sanity Studio
- Add new schemas: pageContent, prayerSettings, resource, siteSettings, teamMember
- Create client components for Services, Media, Resources, Worshippers pages
- Add AnnouncementsSection and PreviewBanner components
- All pages gracefully fall back to static content when Sanity is empty
- Configure cdn.sanity.io in Next.js image domains

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add .npmrc to fix Vercel peer dependency resolution

next-sanity@10.1.4 requires next@^15.1 but project uses next@16.1.3

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
